metadata.title: CVE-2023-6879 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Increasing the resolution of video frames, while performing amulti-threaded encode, can result in a heap overflow inav1_loop_restoration_dealloc().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6879` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aom-tools - 3.7.1-1
libaom3 - 3.7.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: aom package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.1-1').
